## AlRoute.refresh() method

Refreshes the state of a given route.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
refresh(resolve?: boolean): boolean | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resolve | <code>boolean</code> | If true, forces the calculated href and visibility properties to be recalculated. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean | undefined`

Returns true if the route (or one of its children) is activated, false otherwise.
